subject: College Athletics
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Miami was selected as the top seed for the 64-team N.C.A.A. Division I baseball tournament. The Hurricanes (47-8), who won the Atlantic Coast Conference tournament for the first time, will host one of 16 double-elimination regionals that begin Friday. The other seeds, in order, are: North Carolina (46-12), Arizona State (45-11), Florida State (48-10), Cal State Fullerton (37-19), Rice (42-13), L.S.U. (43-16-1) and Georgia (35-21-1).
